thread.title: Global Shares Pause Amid Political Drama

author: Mike Bird
title: Global Shares Pause Amid Political Drama
text:
U.S. stocks bounced Friday but headed for weekly losses, after a shaky stretch of trading renewed many investors’ fears over the course of trade policy.
Stocks have struggled for traction this week as investors have weighed fresh rebukes to the Trump administration’s protectionist trade agenda. Investors have dumped shares of materials and industrial companies, which some fear could suffer if U.S. tariffs on steel and aluminum imports drive up costs for manufacturers.
